**Default Values**: all hardware compiler gate combination logic
**Allowed Values**: and requires exact 1:1 correspondence of two-qubit gates with gates on the system. This requires the circuit be submitted using one of the native two-qubit gates on the system
column5: otherwise an error will be returned"

**Description**: "turns off all TKET optimizations and all hardware compiler gate combination logic. If more than 1 native gate is used in the circuit
**Default Values**: the circuit will be rebased to 1 native gate
**Allowed Values**: but no further gate combination logic will occur. The job will fail if no-opt is set to True and the circuit contains non-native gates."
the hardware compiler will provide further gate combination logic as makes sense for ions and transport"

**Description**: "Uses the legacy QASM compilation flow for programs
**Default Values**: without converting QASM programs to QIR. Accepts Boolean argument."
